text: The Munji are a tribal group formerly based in Badakhshan province of Afghanistan. They number around 7,800.https://www.peoplegroups.org/explore/groupdetails.aspx?peid=23969 Now they are based in Chitral District. They are mostly Shia Muslims. They speak the Munji language. ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Chitral District
title: Munji people
